metadata.Name: TUNIZI
metadata.Description: TUNIZI is the first Tunisian Arabizi Dataset including 3K sentences, balanced, covering different topics, preprocessed and annotated as positive and negative.
metadata.Paper Title: TUNIZI: a Tunisian Arabizi sentiment analysis Dataset
metadata.Venue Title: AfricaNLP Workshop, Putting Africa on the NLP Map. ICLR 2020, Virtual Event
metadata.Abstract: On social media, Arabic speakers tend to express themselves in their own local dialect. To do so, Tunisians use 'Tunisian Arabizi', which consists in supplementing numerals to the Latin script rather than the Arabic alphabet. TUNIZI is the first Tunisian Arabizi Dataset including 3K sentences, balanced, covering different topics, preprocessed and annotated as positive and negative. Data was collected by the iCompass team (http://www.icompass.tn).
